Data: Kuldeep to Warner, no run flight outside off, driven to cover
Kuldeep to Warner, no run the googly outside off, coming back in, driven to cover again
Kuldeep to Warner, no run plenty of flight and loop, Warner reaches out for it and drives to cover
Kuldeep to Warner, 1 run overpitched on off, driven back to the bowler but Kuldeep doesn't get down quickly enough and the ball finds a way through. One to long-off
Kuldeep to Finch, 1 run 79 kph, flight on middle and off, swept down to fine leg for one
Kuldeep to Warner, 1 run runs down this time to get to the pitch, converts flight into a full toss and drives to long-on
Hardik to Warner, 2 runs shortish and wide, Warner plays this down to third man for a couple. A deft dab
Hardik to Warner, 1 run on the pads again, nurdled down to fine leg

Hardik to Finch, OUT mis-timed and gone. Australia's man in touch is gone. A full delivery outside off from Pandya, Finch tries to go over mid-off, the right ball to hit, but can only skew the ball off the outside half towards Bumrah at mid-off, who rusn to his left, takes the catch, but the ball pops out. The ball is rolling all over his legs like an insect, but Bumrah uses his feel, not his sight, to hold on somehow.
Hardik to Smith, FOUR runs my gosh. That's his first ball. Overpitched from Pandya outside off, Smith leans on his drive and nails the cover drive. To the left of cover. Beautiful
Hardik to Smith, 1 run full outside off, skewed off the outside half to deep point
Hardik to Warner, no run a full slow delivery outside off, driven to cover. Nice over from Pandya
Kuldeep to Smith, no run lots of flight on that outside off, Smith strides forward to defend
Kuldeep to Smith, no run good stop. Flight on middle and leg, driven to Rahane at midwicket who dives to his left
Kuldeep to Smith, no run the stock ball on middle and leg, nudged to midwicket again, with the spin
Kuldeep to Smith, no run four in a row. Flighted on middle, worked to midwicket
Kuldeep to Smith, no run the trajectory changes, shorter and quicker, Smith reads the googly well, goes back and plays towards gully
Kuldeep to Smith, no run the second maiden of the innings. Flatter outside off, Smith stays back to defend. Nicely bowled
Jadhav to Warner, 1 run extremely full and wide, Warner reaches out and guides to deep point

Jadhav to Smith, 1 run a high full toss on middle and leg, whacked away to deep midwicket. Should have been put in the stands, but Smith doesn't take the bait just yet. Might have just been intentional, you kow
Jadhav to Warner, no run flat outside off, defended into the off side
Jadhav to Warner, 1 wide flat and quick, but far too wide outside off, wide
Jadhav to Warner, no run quick on off, no turn at all. Pushed to cover
Jadhav to Warner, no run short and wide, scythed down to third man, where Axar dives away to his right
Jadhav to Warner, no run full and wide again, awkwardly played to cover
Kuldeep to Smith, no run short and wide outside off, the ball turning in, cut to cover
Kuldeep to Smith, 1 run terrific use of the feet, gets right to the pitch and flicks to deep midwicket
Kuldeep to Warner, 1 run the reverse sweep, flat and straight, Warner just paddles that to backward point. Bumrah dives to his left
Kuldeep to Smith, no run slightly short, Smith stays back and cuts towards the bowler
Kuldeep to Smith, 1 run dances down and drives to long-off
Kuldeep to Warner, 1 run nice finish, quick and straight,a thick inside edge towards square leg
Jadhav to Warner, 1 run wide arm, slingy action, wideeeee outside off. Warner reaches out and drives to deep point
Jadhav to Smith, 1 run 90 kph, another full toss on middle, whipped to deep midwicket
Jadhav to Warner, no run slow and straight, full, defended back
Jadhav to Warner, no run short and wide, coming in, sliced to third man
Jadhav to Warner, 1 run flat and straight, worked to midwicket
Jadhav to Smith, 1 wide drifts down leg, Smith tries to paddle but doesn't make contact
Jadhav to Smith, no run 83 kph, on the pads, nudged to midwicket where Kohli dives away to his right
Kuldeep to Warner, 1 run short and wide, Warner goes back and clobbers a pull to long-off
Kuldeep to Smith, 1 run 76 kph, googly on middle, Smith stays in his crease, reads the variation off the pitch and stabs a flick in time to square leg
Kuldeep to Warner, 1 run the googly again, on middle and leg, worked to square leg
Kuldeep to Smith, no run 75 kph, lots of flight outside off, defended into the cover region
Kuldeep to Smith, 1 run 74 kph, Smith shuffles down and drives to long-off. Nicely played
Kuldeep to Warner, FOUR runs drilled through cover. Lots of flight outside off, Warner nails a drive, gets it wide of cover and that races away. Waited for it
Jadhav to Smith, 1 run flight outside off, Smith runs down and drives to long-on. Too easy
Jadhav to Warner, no run flat outside off, blocked to point
Jadhav to Warner, 1 run overpitched and straight, pushed to long-off
Jadhav to Smith, 1 run short and straight, wide arm, punched to long-on
Jadhav to Warner, 1 run shortish outside off, Warner feigns a switch hit, but holds his stance and guides a cut to deep point
Jadhav to Smith, no run 85 kph, short and wide, chopped away towards cover.
Axar Patel to Warner, no run length ball on middle stump, clipped to square leg
Axar Patel to Warner, 1 run back of a length outside off, chopped to backward point
Axar Patel to Smith, 1 run back of a length, angling into off and middle. Punched down to long-on
Axar Patel to Warner, no run flat and full close to off stump, driven hard but straight back to the bowler
Axar Patel to Warner, 1 run a bit of flight now, full on off stump, clipped down to long-on
Axar Patel to Smith, 1 run tossed up just outside off stump, driven to long-off
Jadhav to Smith, 1 run floated up slow and full on leg stump, flicked away through square leg
Jadhav to Warner, 1 run flat, round-arm, angled in on a good length towards off stump. Stays on the back foot and punches it to the left of the extra-cover fielder to bring up another fifty

Jadhav to Smith, OUT gone! Jadhav does it again! A dangerous, dangerous shot, sweeping from the stumps - because of Jadhav's low arm, the ball follows a stump-to-stump trajectory right from the time it leaves his hand, when he's bowling from over the stumps. It's fairly flat, and it doesn't give him too much time to get down on one knee, and he's in a half-crouch when he swipes at it and misses, and he's struck absolute
Jadhav to Handscomb, 1 run tossed up slow, just outside off, driven to long-off
Jadhav to Warner, 1 run shortish, angling in from wide of the crease, chopped away to deep point
Jadhav to Handscomb, 1 run back of a length, goes with the angle - which is slightly away from off stump, that's how low his arm is getting - and Handscomb punches it to long-on
Axar Patel to Handscomb, no run well bowled. Just a bit of turn, pitches off stump, just misses it, as Handscomb plays back in defence and down the wrong line
Axar Patel to Handscomb, no run a bit fuller, blocked back to the bowler
Axar Patel to Handscomb, 1 run a bit more air on it, a touch wider of off stump, driven to long-off
Axar Patel to Warner, 1 run back of a length, some turn back in towards middle stump. Warner stays back, leg-side of the ball, to jab it past extra-cover and towards long-off
Axar Patel to Handscomb, no run back of a length, angling into middle and off, punched back to the bowler
Axar Patel to Handscomb, 1 run full, angling into leg stump, driven to long-on
Jadhav to Handscomb, 1 run full, slow, angling down leg, clipped gently into the square-leg region
Jadhav to Warner, no run nice length, angling in towards off stump, driven into the point region
Jadhav to Warner, no run back of a length, flat, angling into off stump and cramping Warner. Wants to flat-bat to long-off, maybe, and ends up hitting it back to the bowler
Jadhav to Warner, 1 run a bit of width, slapped to deep point
Jadhav to Handscomb, 2 runs slow flight outside off, gets down low to sweep it through backward square leg
Jadhav to Handscomb, 1 run tossed up just outside off, driven past the diving extra-cover fielder to long-off
Axar Patel to Handscomb, 1 run back of a length on middle and off, no turn, punched to long-off

Axar Patel to Warner, OUT down the track, and Warner's chipped this straight to long-on! Soft dismissal, but maybe he wanted to hit it a lot wider, looking to whip it in the air from outside off stump. The lack of turn may have forced him to hit it straighter, and long-on takes a nice catch running to his left
Axar Patel to Handscomb, 1 run back of a length, angling into middle stump, punched to long-on
Axar Patel to Head, no run shortish outside off, but not too much width. Cut to backward point
Axar Patel to Head, 1 run length ball, a little slower, on off stump. Clipped down to long-on
Axar Patel to Handscomb, no run full with a bit of flight on middle stump, defended inside-out into the point region
Jadhav to Head, no run full on off stump. Drives hard, looking to hit straight of long-on, and Jadhav dives left to stop it
Jadhav to Head, no run goes back to a length ball angling into middle stump, defends with a straight bat into the on side
Jadhav to Head, 1 run shortish outside off, slapped to sweeper cover
Jadhav to Handscomb, 2 runs floated up just outside off. Read the line well, Handscomb, stretched out and got his head over the ball to lap-sweep fine, just to the left of the keeper
Jadhav to Handscomb, 1 run shortish, turning in towards off stump, goes back and plays a whip-pull to the left of the man at square leg
Jadhav to Head, no run full on off stump, defended to extra-cover
Axar Patel to Handscomb, no run nice length, angling into off stump. Looks to drive to long-on and gets a leading-edge that loops to the left of that catcher at short extra

Axar Patel to Handscomb, OUT oh no. Another batsman falls to the sweep. This time it's extra bounce rather than lack of bounce, and Handscomb gets a top-edge that flies high behind the wicket. Rahane runs back from slip and judges it perfectly. This was flat, just outside off, and pitched shorter than Handscomb expected
Axar Patel to Head, no run length ball on off stump, clipped to short, straight midwicket
Axar Patel to Head, 1 run full, just outside off, driven to long-on
Axar Patel to Stoinis, no run full on middle and off, blocked down the ground, towards the non-striker
Axar Patel to Stoinis, no run speared in flat and full on leg stump, defended with a straight bat towards midwicket
Jadhav to Head, no run round-arm length ball angling into off and middle. Goes back to defend into the covers
Jadhav to Head, no run wider outside off now, gets on the front foot to slap to point
Jadhav to Head, no run
Jadhav to Head, FOUR runs for once, Jadhav drops one in the slot for a big drive. Actually, Head made the length by stepping out of his crease, and drove powerfully past the bowler
Jadhav to Head, no run tossed up a bit wider, driven to extra-cover
Jadhav to Head, no run slow, on a good length outside off, defended into the covers
Axar Patel to Stoinis, no run slows it up outside off, and Stoinis, shaping for the paddle-sweep, is too early into his shot, is hit on the pad
Axar Patel to Stoinis, 1 run full outside off, driven to long-off
Axar Patel to Head, no run length ball on off stump, clipped to midwicket
Axar Patel to Head, 1 run back of a length on off and middle, whipped to deep square leg

Axar Patel to Stoinis, FOUR runs ooh, some dip and turn there, and Stoinis bisects keeper and slip. Stretched forward to defend, wasn't near the pitch of it - Axar had slowed it up considerably - and the outside edge finds the gap perfectly
Axar Patel to Stoinis, no run again some turn, starts from wider outside off, stretches out to jab to point
Jadhav to Head, no run full outside off, driven to short extra-cover
Jadhav to Head, no run back of a length, angling into off stump, makes room and slaps to cover - the sweeper's been brought in to the edge of the circle now
Jadhav to Head, 1 run flat, on the stumps, worked through square leg
Jadhav to Stoinis, 1 run tossed up on middle stump, clipped to long-on
Jadhav to Head, 1 run back of a length, angling into off stump, makes some room for the flat-bat slap to long-off, past the diving extra-cover fielder
Jadhav to Stoinis, no run drops this on a nice length on off stump, presses forward to defend towards short midwicket
Axar Patel to Head, no run length ball close to off stump, clipped to short midwicket
Axar Patel to Head, no run back of a length on off stump, uses his wrists to play that to short midwicket
Axar Patel to Head, FOUR runs tossed up fuller now, outside off, and Head drives between cover and extra-cover. Nice stride forward and a whip of the wrists to give it impetus
Axar Patel to Head, no run back of a length, just outside off, defended to short extra-cover
Axar Patel to Head, no run down the track now, whips this from off stump to the man at square midwicket
Axar Patel to Head, no run a bit of extra bounce. Looks to sweep this length ball turning in towards off stump, and the ball jumps and hits him on the hip
Jadhav to Stoinis, no run length ball turning down leg, Stoinis misses the sweep. Big appeal for caught behind, not given. Not called wide either. Maybe a tickle of pad?
Jadhav to Stoinis, 1 run length ball on the pads, clipped through square leg
Jadhav to Head, no run fullish, angling into off stump. Looks for the drive to long-off. Kohli intercepts with a dive to his left from short extra
Jadhav to Head, 1 run skips down the track now, clips this from just outside off down to long-on
Jadhav to Stoinis, no run tossed up slow outside off. Looks for the drive to long-off and Jadhav sprints to his left and dives to cut it off
Jadhav to Stoinis, 1 run full, angling down leg, clipped to long leg
Axar Patel to Stoinis, no run slow length ball wide of off stump, Stoinis looks to sweep, misses
Axar Patel to Stoinis, 2 runs flat length ball that spins away from off stump. Stoinis is only half-forward in defence, and the thick outside edge runs away to the right of slip
Axar Patel to Stoinis, no run flat length ball, this one goes with the angle. Again he's only half forward in defence and gets an inside-edge into his pad
Axar Patel to Stoinis, no run back of a length, another slider, defended from the crease towards midwicket
Axar Patel to Stoinis, no run back of a length close to off stump, defended into the covers

Axar Patel to Stoinis, FOUR runs and again! Why is slip so wide? Length ball spins away from off stump, and again Stoinis is nowhere near the pitch while propping forward to defend. The outside edge beats Dhoni to his right, and slip is nowhere near it
Jadhav to Head, FOUR runs angles this down the leg side, and Head capitalises, gets down quickly to sweep it nice and fine - short fine leg is rather square
Jadhav to Head, 1 run down the track now, doesn't quite reach the pitch of this flat one outside off. Swings hard and hits it down to long-on, along the ground, off the inside half of the bat

Jadhav to Stoinis, SIX runs down the track, and he's just cleared the leaping long-on fielder. Gets into a great position for the lofted drive, and hit it straight, so long-on had quite a distance to move to his left. Went a fair way over his head too
Jadhav to Stoinis, 1 run back of a length outside off, slapped into the covers
Jadhav to Head, 1 run back of a length on middle stump, punched to long-on
Jadhav to Stoinis, no run back of a length outside off, stops on him and keeps low. Wanted to slap that through the covers, ends up flat-batting it back to the bowler
Axar Patel to Head, 1 run flat, angling into the pads, clipped to long leg

Axar Patel to Stoinis, 2 runs Stoinis was in position to sweep even before Axar released. Sends one down slightly shorter outside off, and the batsman adjusts, plays a controlled half-pull off one knee, through square leg
Axar Patel to Stoinis, no run back of a length on off stump, punched to straight midwicket
Axar Patel to Stoinis, no run length ball on off stump, flat, defended to short extra
Axar Patel to Stoinis, no run flat and full, angling into middle stump, blocked back to the bowler
Axar Patel to Stoinis, 1 run short outside off, slapped to sweeper cover

Kuldeep to Stoinis, 1 leg bye the stock ball, flighted, turns sharply from middle and leg to outside leg. Looks to come forward and work it leg side, the ball beats inside edge and rolls into the short fine leg region off pad
Kuldeep to Head, 1 run shortish, goes back to flat-bat to long-off
Kuldeep to Stoinis, no run length ball turning in towards middle and leg, goes forward to clip into the backward square leg region
Kuldeep to Stoinis, 1 run down the track, meets the flighted ball on a middle-stump line and drags a drive down to long-on, past the bowler's right hand. He was a little slow bending down
Kuldeep to Head, no run excellent length. Draws Head forward with flight, and beats him with dip and sharp turn. Head's hands followed the ball, looking to jab through cover point

Kuldeep to Head, no run tossed up outside off, sharp turn again, and he misses the sweep. Or has he? Big appeal from Dhoni, and India have reviewed umpire Nandan's not-out decision. Was there a bottom edge? Ultra-edge says no.
Bumrah to Stoinis, 1 run back of a length, angling into off stump, lets it come on and tucks it into the midwicket region
Bumrah to Head, 1 run length ball on middle stump, clipped through square leg
Bumrah to Stoinis, no run length ball outside off, gets on the front foot to defend back to the bowler
Bumrah to Stoinis, no run back of a length outside off, punched into the point region and Rahane moves quickly to his right from backward point to deny him the single
Bumrah to Stoinis, no run back of a length outside off, a little wider than the previous ball, left alone
Bumrah to Stoinis, 1 run full on off stump, driven firmly down the ground and Pandey stops it with a dive to his right from mid-on
Kuldeep to Stoinis, no run down the track and Kuldeep slows it down considerably. Finds himself nowhere near the pitch of it as it turns down leg, and he sticks out his leg to pad it away
Kuldeep to Stoinis, 1 run flatter, back of a length, tucked away through backward square leg
Kuldeep to Head, no run tossed up slow and wide of off. Goes for the big flat-bat drive and he's beaten by turn and bounce. Dhoni takes it over his shoulder, and falls backwards but still clings on
Kuldeep to Head, no run full outside off, driven back hard to the bowler
Kuldeep to Head, 1 run tossed up on off stump, driven to long-off
Kuldeep to Stoinis, 1 run back of a length, googly turning towards off stump, goes back to whip it to long-on
Bumrah to Stoinis, no run back of a length, straightens in the corridor close to off stump. Jumps back and across to defend towards backward point
Bumrah to Stoinis, 1 run short and wide, slapped away to the right of third man
Bumrah to Head, no run fullish, angling across the left-hander and away from off stump. Goes for the big drive and misses
Bumrah to Head, no run length ball on middle and leg, punched back to the bowler
Bumrah to Head, 1 run back of a length on leg stump, worked towards mid-on
Bumrah to Stoinis, no run back of a length, angling into middle stump. Defended back to the bowler
Kuldeep to Head, 1 run flight outside off, the stock ball, squeezed into the point region for a run
Kuldeep to Stoinis, no run flat outside off, Stoinis goes right back in the crease to clip into the leg side
Kuldeep to Stoinis, 1 run short down leg, worked away through square leg. Not giving too much room
Kuldeep to Head, no run overpitched and straight, flicked to midwicket. The line is straight
Kuldeep to Head, 2 runs would have been wide had he left it, but this is a good result nonetheless. Short and wide, Head stretches out and clatters a slap wide of cover for a couple
Kuldeep to Head, 1 run the googly on middle, nudged to deep square leg
Axar Patel to Head, 1 run short outside off, the ball skids on, Head mis-times the pull to long-off
Axar Patel to Stoinis, 1 run drifts down leg and Stoinis paddle sweeps down to fine leg
Axar Patel to Head, no run flat and straight, no turn, shovelled to midwicket
Axar Patel to Head, 1 leg bye sees Head coming and fires this down leg, off the pad to square leg. Head undone but adjusted well
Axar Patel to Stoinis, no run flat and straight, Stoinis defends
Axar Patel to Stoinis, 2 runs how did that not hit the stumps? Short and straight, the ball skids on, takes the inside edge and somehow misses the stumps. Two down to fine leg
Kuldeep to Head, 2 runs short and wide again, too much width, Head rocks back and crashes a cut past cover for a couple
Kuldeep to Head, FOUR runs hammered! Gets low, premeditates the slog sweep, stays low and executes, over midwicket. Just in front of the boundary
Kuldeep to Head, 1 run short and wide again, slapped to long-off for one

Kuldeep to Stoinis, no run just short of Axar, who did not go for the catch. A googly on middle, Stoinis comes down and outside-edges the variation towards short third man. Well bowled, shortened the length
Kuldeep to Stoinis, no run flight outside off, driven back to the bowler
Axar Patel to Head, no run that's close! Head dances down the track and misses the flick, struck him just outside the line maybe
Axar Patel to Head, 1 run short outside off, a dragged pull to deep midwicket
Axar Patel to Stoinis, no run short on off, pushed back to the bowler
Axar Patel to Stoinis, 1 wide very slow and wide outside off, Stoinis watches it go by. Axar anticipated Stoinis coming down
Axar Patel to Stoinis, no run pushed back to the bowler
Axar Patel to Stoinis, 1 run flat down leg, clipped to square leg

Axar Patel to Head, OUT 94 kph, Head is gone. Premeditating the sweep, Axar is all too familiar with it. He fires it full and straight, Head tries to bail out of his sweep, but is in no position to improvise, the ball finds the gap, a big gap, between bat and pad and hits the stumps
Kuldeep to Stoinis, 1 run the googly outside off, punched to deep point from the back foot. Wanted the conventional sweep, but adjusted well
Kuldeep to Wade, no run toe-ends the ball back to the bowler. Sweepy Wade gets down immediately, but plays it too early
Kuldeep to Wade, 1 run short outside off, worked to deep midwicket off the back foot
Kuldeep to Stoinis, 1 run the googly. So much extra bounce because of the revs through the variation, Stoinis watches it onto his cut and finds deep point
Kuldeep to Wade, 2 runs executed this time. A low full toss is swept fine towards fine leg. Bhuvi picks up and fires at the right end, the bowler's end, but Stoinis makes it in time
Kuldeep to Wade, no run
Bumrah to Stoinis, no run good length around off, the ball seams back in, pushed back to the bowler

Bumrah to Stoinis, OUT given by umpire Erasmus. Stoinis reviews again. Umpire's call will decide this. Full on off, the ball has seamed back in prodigiously and struck Stoinis in front of off, beaten by discernible late lateral movement. No bat. Impact is umpire's call so Stoinis has to walk back. Fell over his stroke slightly
Bumrah to Faulkner, no run full and straight again, Faulkner gets forward to defend
Bumrah to Faulkner, no run full and straight again, pushed away to mid-on. Another dot. Five on the bounce

Bumrah to Faulkner, 1 bye beaten on the outside edge. Fantastic bowling from Bumrah. Full outside off, Faulkner is beaten on the outside edge, the ball bounces in front of Dhoni, and ricochets away, enabling the bye
Bhuvneshwar to Faulkner, 1 run on the pads to start from Bhuvi, nudged down to fine leg
Bhuvneshwar to Wade, 1 run good length delivery on off, Wade is rushed on his pull, gets one to midwicket
Bhuvneshwar to Faulkner, no run sees Faulkner coming and hits that hard length, short outside off, mis-timed to cover. The dots racking up
Bhuvneshwar to Faulkner, 1 run on the pads, bat on ball to square leg. Losing momentum
Bhuvneshwar to Wade, no run a low full toss, Wade drives the ball straight back to Bhuvneshwar. Pressure building
Bhuvneshwar to Wade, no run full and very wide outside off, 123 kph, miscued back to the bowler. Another dot. Just 19 runs off the last five overs.
Bumrah to Head, no run fullish length outside off, Head fails to connect with a slap. Bounces in front of Dhoni, who stops the ball with a grimace
Bumrah to Head, 1 run full and wide outside off, a thick outside edge down to third man
Bumrah to Stoinis, no run a terrific yorker, on middle and leg. Stoinis jams it out just in time
Bumrah to Stoinis, no run lovely line. 132 kph, outside off, fuller than a good length. The ball zips past the outside edge. Lands well in front of Dhoni again
Bumrah to Stoinis, no run full and straight, Stoinis plays with an angled bat, and the ball skews back to the bowler
Bumrah to Stoinis, no run full and wide outside off, dabbed to point. Struggling to hit the gaps consistently
Kuldeep to Head, 1 run nails the slog sweep, but finds deep midwicket running to his right. Lots of flight on middle and off, hammered by Head
Kuldeep to Stoinis, FOUR runs in the gap. Stoinis definitely has the ability to hit the ball, like this. Flight on middle and leg, Stoinis gets low and creams an uppish sweep in the gap at square leg
Kuldeep to Stoinis, no run runs down at the bowler, but Kuldeep's googly is shorter, so Stoinis adjusts and keeps it out
Kuldeep to Stoinis, 1 run doesn't quite get to the pitch. Australia probably attacking this last over of the second Powerplay. Stoinis runs down and skews a lofted drive to deep midwicket
Kuldeep to Head, 1 run short and wide, the stock ball, slashed to the sweeper cover

Kuldeep to Stoinis, FOUR runs there is no one there. The googly, short and wide, the ball rips and spins away from Stoinis, who goes deep in the crease and slashes it in the gap at extra cover. That's terrific batting, Kuldeep though Stoinis was coming down
Bumrah to Faulkner, 1 run good length on off, muscled to mid-off for one. Wanted more than one
Bumrah to Wade, no run 138 kph, looking for the paddle scoop. A yorker on off, Wade toe-ends it back again.
Bumrah to Wade, 1 run full on off, skewed away to deep point for one. The ball moving away late
Bumrah to Faulkner, 1 run a yorker on leg, nudged to deep midwicket, just the one again.
Bumrah to Wade, 2 runs wow, a lucky two. A slower ball down leg, Wade is too early through his flick, toe-ends it away to deep midwicket. Bumrah chases after it, two easy
Bumrah to Wade, 1 run another slower delivery to finish, 119 kph, on off, worked to square leg. Just six off that over

Bhuvneshwar to Wade, SIX runs he has hit that well enough. Full and wide outside off, Wade gets underneath the length and gets enough power to clear mid-off. Tried to hit that over cover, but all muscle
Bhuvneshwar to Wade, 1 run good yorker there. On middle and off, jammed back to the bowler who parries it away while diving to his right
Bhuvneshwar to Faulkner, 1 run a low full toss on middle and leg, driven back to Wade, who had to hurry out of the way. Pandya gets across from long-on
Bhuvneshwar to Wade, 2 runs good idea, decent execution. Wanted to hit that over square leg, the slower ball on leg, Wade got that over square leg but not enough power behind it. A couple
Bhuvneshwar to Wade, 1 run a fine low full toss on off, driven away to long-off, just one. India will be happy with this
Bhuvneshwar to Faulkner, 1 run terrific bowling, another low full toss, driven to long-on. 12 off it, a decent over for Australia

Bumrah to Faulkner, 1 run full and straight, skewed away to midwicket. Faulkner races back for the second, Wade looks and sends Faulkner back far too late. The throw to the bowler lands in front of Bumrah who allows it go by, allowing Faulkner to run back to make his crease. Sloppy
Bumrah to Wade, 1 run full and straight, a miscued loft to long-on, on the bounce
Bumrah to Faulkner, 1 run a wide slower ball outside off, mis-timed to cover for another single.
Bumrah to Wade, 1 run looked like the bat went as far as the ball. Wade runs down, converts the yorker into a low full toss and squeezed that to deep point for one. Bat and ball lands safely
Bumrah to Faulkner, 1 run mis-timed badly to long-on. A low full toss again, Faulkner can only bunt it away to long-on. Wade struggling to catch his breath back

Bumrah to Wade, OUT 135 kph, straight to the sweeper cover. Just five off that. A low full toss outside off, Wade gets underneath that but can only slice it away to the man on the sweeper boundary. Wade tried but that's a slightly under-par cameo
Bhuvneshwar to Faulkner, 1 run dropped by Pandya. A low full toss from Bhuvi, Faulkner smashes it to long-on, where Pandya runs in, but drops it. Couldn't keep up with his momentum
Bhuvneshwar to Cummins, 1 run good length on off, slapped away to deep midwicket. Pandey is quick on it. Just one
Bhuvneshwar to Faulkner, 1 run full and wide outside off, Faulkner reaches out but can only find the sweeper cover.
Bhuvneshwar to Cummins, 1 run full and straight again, all Cummins can do is drive to long-on, with the direction of swing. Another single

Bhuvneshwar to Faulkner, 1 run, OUT run-out! A 123 kph slower ball wide outside off, Faulkner can only mis-time it to long-on, he wants to retain strike for the final ball, and runs back but was never going to make it. Dhoni collects the ball and removes the bails with Faulkner a foot short
Bhuvneshwar to Coulter-Nile, OUT misses a full, straight ball. 138 kph, full on off, Coulter-Nile winds up and looks to unfurl a big swing, but fails to connect at all. The off stump is uprooted

4.57pm Australia have continued to struggle in the end overs. All they could muster is 32 runs off the last six overs, substantially below par, even though this surface is slightly two-paced. It seemed, after the start, that Australia set themselves up for 300 again, but yet again, another absolute struggle towards the end overs. Pace off the ball, cutters, the quicker delivery, that's what Australia need, and hope that it can

5.40pm Hello again. In these conditions, 243 might not be an entirely straightforward target to chase, but do Australia have an attack that can exploit this slow, low and grippy pitch? Rohit Sharma and Ajinkya Rahane are out in the middle now, as are the Australian players. It's Pat Cummins to bowl the first over.

Cummins to Rahane, no run shortish, a bit of inward nip as Rahane looks to defend, ends up playing slightly outside the line. Appeal for lbw, but that definitely struck him too high, on the left thigh pad
Cummins to Rahane, no run length ball close to off stump, defended into the covers

Cummins to Rahane, FOUR runs length ball on middle stump, and that's beautifully played. Just leaned forward, let the ball arrive under his eyes, and met it with a straight bat, turning his wrists at the moment of contact to send it running away to the left of square leg
Cummins to Rahane, 1 run back of a length outside off, dabbed away to third man
Cummins to Rohit Sharma, no run back of a length on off stump, defended to mid-on
Cummins to Rohit Sharma, no run a little fuller, similar line as the previous ball, angling into off stump. Lets it come on and defends to mid-on
Coulter-Nile to Rahane, no run full, fourth-stump line, defended to mid-off. Just a bit of outswing, as always
Coulter-Nile to Rahane, no run back of a length, angling into off stump, defended back to the bowler
Coulter-Nile to Rahane, 1 run shortish, fourth-stump line, lets it come on and opens his bat face to dab it down to third man

Coulter-Nile to Rohit Sharma, no run good ball. Back of a length, fifth-stump line, just a bit of late shape away. Rohit hangs his bat away from his body, neither defending nor attacking, and is beaten by the movement
Coulter-Nile to Rohit Sharma, no run back of a length on off stump, defended back towards the bowler. Straightened again, and squared up the batsman slightly
Coulter-Nile to Rohit Sharma, no run back of a length, angling into middle and off, clipped to square leg

Cummins to Rahane, FOUR runs fullish, close to off stump, and Rahane is a little early into his straight drive, checks his shot slightly, but times it so well that it races away unstoppably between non-striker and umpire
Cummins to Rahane, no run back of a length, fourth-stump line. Looks for that single to third man again, and Smith dives left from backward point to deny him. We saw a lot of this in Bengaluru too
Cummins to Rahane, 1 run back of a length, angling into off stump. Takes a step back and across and pushes gently to the right of mid-on
Cummins to Rohit Sharma, no run length ball on off stump, clipped to midwicket
Cummins to Rohit Sharma, no run back of a length close to off stump, defended into the point region
Cummins to Rohit Sharma, no run length ball, fourth-stump line. Looks to play the stand-up drive on the up, doesn't really time it and can't beat the man at cover
Coulter-Nile to Rahane, no run length ball angling into off stump, clipped to mid-on
Coulter-Nile to Rahane, 1 run length ball on off stump, clipped to the right of mid-on. Doesn't put as much weight on the shot as with the previous ball, and as a result he gets an easy single
Coulter-Nile to Rohit Sharma, no run back of a length close to off stump, defended into the covers
Coulter-Nile to Rohit Sharma, no run a bit of extra bounce and some inward movement towards off and middle. Looks to clip into the leg side and the ball hits him on the thigh pad
Coulter-Nile to Rohit Sharma, no run back of a length, fifth-stump line, opens his bat face for a push to backward point

Coulter-Nile to Rohit Sharma, no run good ball. Angled in towards off stump, and it straightens just a bit. Rohit was looking to play it with the angle, into the leg side, and had to adjust late to play it towards the bowler off the outside half of his bat
Cummins to Rahane, no run back of a length on off stump, defended to mid-on
Cummins to Rahane, 1 run length ball close to off stump. Lets it come on and opens his bat face to place it to the right of third man
Cummins to Rohit Sharma, no run fullish on off stump, driven crisply to mid-off

Cummins to Rohit Sharma, no run all those dot balls, and Rohit goes for a big hit. Back of a length, angling into off stump. Swings at it, looking to hit over mid-on, and inside-edges into his pad. Loops up in the air, and fortunately for the batsman drops short of Cummins's stretch

Cummins to Rohit Sharma, FOUR runs and now he's off the mark. Overpitched, for once, angling into off stump, and all he has to do is meet it with the full face and drive back past the bowler, to the right of mid-off
Cummins to Rohit Sharma, FOUR runs two in two. Not overpitched like the previous one, but full nonetheless, and he extends his arms through another drive to hit over the top, to the right of mid-off
Coulter-Nile to Rahane, no run length ball, fourth-stump line. Stretches forward and across to clip to midwicket
Coulter-Nile to Rahane, FOUR runs oh wow. What a shot. That's a perfectly good length, just a few inches outside off, and he leans forward and drives on the up, between cover and mid-off
Coulter-Nile to Rahane, no run length ball on off stump, shows the full face for a push to mid-on
Coulter-Nile to Rahane, no run length ball on off stump, punched to mid-off
Coulter-Nile to Rahane, no run length ball, fourth-stump line, punched hard but straight back to the bowler
Coulter-Nile to Rahane, no run shortish, close to off stump. Jumps to ride the bounce and defend towards backward point
Stoinis to Rohit Sharma, 1 run full on off stump, clipped to long-on
Stoinis to Rahane, no run back of a length on off stump, punched to mid-on
Stoinis to Rahane, no run back of a length on off stump, punched to mid-off
Stoinis to Rahane, 1 run back of a length, fourth-stump line, dabbed down to third man
Stoinis to Rohit Sharma, 1 run full, angling into leg stump. Shows the full face to drive to long-on
Stoinis to Rahane, no run back of a length, angling into middle and leg. Cramps Rahane for room as he tries to whip it off his hip. Can't put much power on it and it rolls down towards midwicket
Coulter-Nile to Rohit Sharma, no run short outside off. Rohit looks to pull, and is through his shot a little early. The ball hits him on the back arm
Coulter-Nile to Rohit Sharma, no run short again, this one sits up at waist height on off stump. Pulled straight to square leg
Coulter-Nile to Rohit Sharma, no run short, wide, and again Rohit smacks one straight to a fielder. Stands up tall and slaps it straight to Head at cover point
Coulter-Nile to Rohit Sharma, no run back of a length on off stump. Looks to punch through the covers but it stops on him and he ends up hitting it towards mid-on, off the inside half of his bat

Coulter-Nile to Rohit Sharma, FOUR runs slower ball, full and fairly wide outside off. Maybe wanted to bait him into an uppish drive, but Rohit got a nice stride in, got his head over the ball, and drove all along the ground, to the right of cover point
Coulter-Nile to Rohit Sharma, no run slower ball, back of a length outside off, beats Rohit's edge as he tries to run it down to third man
Stoinis to Rahane, no run back of a length close to off stump, punched firmly to the left of mid-off
Stoinis to Rahane, 1 run down the track and he bangs it in short. Pulled away through square leg

Stoinis to Rohit Sharma, FOUR runs shortish, angling into middle stump, and that's nicely played. Steps across his stumps and helps it away to the left of short fine leg, front leg going up in a prace
Stoinis to Rohit Sharma, no run back of a length close to off stump, defended towards backward point
Stoinis to Rohit Sharma, no run back of a length, angling into the pads. Poor ball with fine leg inside the circle, but he gets away with it, Rohit tucking it straight to the fielder
Stoinis to Rohit Sharma, no run back of a length close to off stump, punched to mid-off

Faulkner to Rahane, FOUR runs starts with a full ball outside off, and Rahane puts it away easily. Leans forward and drives to the right of extra-cover, and the timing's so good long-off has no chance
Faulkner to Rahane, 1 run pulls his length back slightly, Rahane presses forward and pushes to long-off
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, no run back of a length outside off. Reaches out and steers to short third man
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, no run steps down the track and Faulkner bowls a back-of-a-length slower ball outside off. Punched to extra-cover
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, 1 run slower length ball on off stump, pushed down the ground to long-off
Faulkner to Rahane, no run slower ball, back of a length, fourth-stump line. Defended towards backward point
Zampa to Rohit Sharma, 1 run starts with a nicely flighted legbreak on off stump and Rahane drives to long-off. A checked drive - he was a little early on that, and the ball was in the air briefly
Zampa to Rahane, no run length ball spinning towards off stump, opens his bat face to slice to backward point
Zampa to Rahane, no run goes back to a length ball on off stump, punches to cover point
Zampa to Rahane, 1 run down the track to the flighted ball, meets it on the full and jabs to long-off
Zampa to Rohit Sharma, 1 run short, a bit of width, stabbed straight to backward point but a fumble allows a single
Zampa to Rahane, 1 run down the track again, clips this one down to long-on
Head to Rahane, 1 run full on off stump, clipped back down the pitch. Head moves to his right but can't quite get down in time and the ball trickles away towards long-on
Head to Rohit Sharma, 1 run ooh, some turn, and it stops on Rohit as well. Back of a length, and he plays with a straight bat and it loops up in the air but safely down to long-on
Head to Rahane, 1 run on leg stump now and he clips it away through square leg
Head to Rohit Sharma, 1 run tossed up a bit slower, stretches forward to drive to long-on
Head to Rahane, 1 run down the track to the flighted ball outside off, drives to long-off
Head to Rohit Sharma, 1 run tossed up slow outside off, and Rohit presses forward and uses his wrists deftly to clip it with the turn to the right of square leg
Zampa to Rohit Sharma, 1 run back of a length close to off stump, lets it come on and dabs towards backward point
Zampa to Rahane, 1 run down the track, and was he looking to hit that inside-out? Wrong'un, and he inside-edges into the fine-leg region

Zampa to Rohit Sharma, FOUR runs another edge! This time Rohit looks to drive inside-out, from a leg line, and the ball dips and turns and the outside edge runs away to the right of the keeper. No slip, though. A bit of inward drift forced him to go inside-out
Zampa to Rohit Sharma, no run quicker now, on off stump, defended back towards the bowler
Zampa to Rohit Sharma, 2 runs loopy full-toss wide of off, driven to the right of sweeper cover
Zampa to Rohit Sharma, FOUR runs ah, no. Twice he's found the edge, but it ends up as a good over for India. Ends it with a long-hop, and Rahane swivels to pull it away through square leg
Head to Rahane, no run tossed up outside off, presses forward to defend into the covers
Head to Rahane, 2 runs down the track and Head shortens his length, pulled away to the left of long leg
Head to Rahane, no run tossed up full outside off, Rahane takes a big stride forward and almost yorks himself as he jabs to cover
Head to Rahane, 2 runs down the track, and Rahane picks up another two. Good ball, though. Dipped on Rahane, and an attempted cover drive rolls away through midwicket off the inside half of the bat
Head to Rahane, 1 run a bit straighter, clipped through square leg
Head to Rohit Sharma, no run tossed up outside off, drops onto a nice length, defended into he covers
Zampa to Rahane, 1 run down the track and Zampa tosses it up wider. Frees his arms to hit that in the air, on the bounce, to long-off

Zampa to Rohit Sharma, 1 run back of a length on off stump, goes deep in his crease to use his wrists and work it down the ground to long-on. Again, Zampa moves to his right and stretches, but can't stop the single
Zampa to Rahane, FOUR runs Loopy full-toss on off stump, and Rahane puts it away, drives inside-out to beat sweeper cover to his right
Zampa to Rahane, 1 run floated up full, wider than the previous ball, driven to sweeper cover
Zampa to Rohit Sharma, 1 run full-toss on middle stump, clipped to long-on
Zampa to Rahane, 1 run long-hop, pulled to deep midwicket

Head to Rahane, no run dip, and sharp turn from outside off. Presses forward to defend, then tries to adjust to the dip and work it into the leg side. The ball spins past his inside edge and hits his pad high and loops up to the left of the keeper. Wade got there quickly and appealed for caught-behind, but there was no bat on it
Head to Rahane, 1 run down the track now, gets to the pitch to clip to long-on
Head to Rohit Sharma, 1 run flighted and full on off stump, clipped to long-on
Head to Rahane, no run flatter now, on off stump, punched back to the bowler
Head to Rahane, 1 run nicely flighted on off stump, clipped to the left of square leg
Head to Rohit Sharma, no run flighted ball wide of off, driven into the square cover region
Stoinis to Rahane, 1 run length ball on off stump, driven to long-on
Stoinis to Rohit Sharma, no run back of a length, stops on Rohit and nips in slightly towards middle stump. Adjusts for the lack of pace and defends back to the bowler
Stoinis to Rohit Sharma, 1 run fullish outside off and Rohit plays a checked drive to the left of mid-off, where Finch makes a diving stop
Stoinis to Rahane, no run back of a length, fourth-stump line, punched firmly back to the bowler
Stoinis to Rahane, no run fullish on off stump, blocked back to the bowler
Stoinis to Rahane, 1 run length ball wide of off, Rahane gets down on one knee and plays a flat-bat drive to deep point
Head to Rahane, no run on the pads from Head, nudged to square leg. Slow spin
Head to Rahane, no run good stop there from Smudge. Flat on leg, clipped to Smith at midwicket, who dives to his right. Keeps the pressure on
Head to Rahane, no run Head sees Rahane coming and fires this wide outside off, defended back
Head to Rahane, 1 run whipped away delectably through square leg. Slightly too short and slow, enough time for Rahane

Head to Rohit Sharma, SIX runs takes on the fielder at long-on, and just clears! Flight outside off, Rohit dances down, gets to the pitch and wallops this over long-on with ease. Long boundary, Warner leaps, but it clears the man
Head to Rohit Sharma, FOUR runs steps out again, converts flight into a full toss and drills a drive through cover. Superb batting. Pressure back on Australia to make a play
Stoinis to Rahane, 1 run a cutter outside off, glided off the open face to third man
Stoinis to Rohit Sharma, no run full delivery outside off, Rohit watchfully plays this towards cover
Stoinis to Rohit Sharma, 2 runs on the pads, Rohit works this away past midwicket for a couple, brings up his fifty, another one in the series
Stoinis to Rohit Sharma, no run full delivery outside off, driven away to mid-off. No run there, as the fielder is quick on it
Stoinis to Rohit Sharma, FOUR runs 133 kph, lovely stroke making. Comes down, sees a short delivery and helps his pull easily over midwicket. That's not good bowling, just sits up for Rohit
Stoinis to Rohit Sharma, 2 runs short and wide this time, cut away easily past point for a couple. The sweeper cover had to run around that, not a good over. Smith needs to do something.
Faulkner to Rahane, no run full and straight, pushed back to the bowler, who feigns a throw, which displeases the crowd
Faulkner to Rahane, no run good stop again. Shortish outside off, bunted away towards cover, who gets across to his right

Faulkner to Rahane, 1 run 127 kph, slower delivery on middle and leg, Rahane comes charging at Faulkner and goes through with a nothing hoick. Luckily for him, it is badly timed. The fielder takes it on the bounce
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, 1 run good length on middle and leg, nudged away to midwicket. Soft hands means India get one
Faulkner to Rahane, no run full around off, driven up to mid-on. Boos as Rahane stays on 49

Faulkner to Rahane, FOUR runs beautiful shot to get to fifty. Full and straight, Rahane drills the ball right back at Faulkner, who has no time to get his hands up. Great place to hit the ball, fourth straight fifty for Rahane
Coulter-Nile to Rohit Sharma, no run 130 kph, on a length outside off, defended towards point
Coulter-Nile to Rohit Sharma, 1 run 137 kph, a short slow delivery outside off, dabbed down to third man
Coulter-Nile to Rahane, 1 run another glide off the face of the ball down to third man
Coulter-Nile to Rohit Sharma, 1 run ooh, a slower delivery, 138 kph, Rohit is though his shot but adjusts quickly, gets one down to fine leg
Coulter-Nile to Rahane, no run goes wide of the crease, good length delivery outside off, punched to cover
Coulter-Nile to Rahane, 1 run tidy over. Just four off it, but not good enough for Australia. On a length outside off, a dab down to third man.
Faulkner to Rahane, 1 run chipped to long-off. Full outside off, Rahane goes through with his uppish drive
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, 1 run good length outside off, Rohit tries to hit on the up but a thick outside edge trickles down to third man
Faulkner to Rahane, no run good length delivery outside off, Rahane stays in his crease and punches a drive to cover

Faulkner to Rahane, no run was there a deflection? Yes, thinks Faulkner. Short and wide, Rahane tries to glide it past Wade, but the ball goes on. Can't see anything conclusive. Wade can't collect cleanly as the ball pops out. Yes, UltraEdge has a spike so a drop
Faulkner to Rahane, 1 run more strong bottom hand. On a length on middle, flicked away to square leg
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, 2 runs good stop from Cummins, short and wide, slashed through point. Cummins runs around to his left and hauls it in.
Coulter-Nile to Rahane, no run full delivery outside off, punched away to cover from the crease
Coulter-Nile to Rahane, FOUR runs into the gap behind square for another boundary. Full and straight. Rahane flicks and finds the gap at the backward square leg boundary
Coulter-Nile to Kohli, no run full and straight from Coulter-Nile. Kohli gets his bat right behind the line to defend. Don't think he'll be gliding too many
Coulter-Nile to Kohli, no run good length outside off, goes wide of the crease and defends under his eyes. Good from Coulter-Nile, has been bustling in
Coulter-Nile to Kohli, no run full outside off, Kohli would have got off the mark if that man was back, but Kohli stays on 0. A nice press into his drive to extra cover
Zampa to Rohit Sharma, FOUR runs short and wide from Zampa, tripe. Rohit stays back and slashes a cut behind point, too easy
Zampa to Rohit Sharma, 1 run a low full toss outside off, driven to long-off with so much ease. Struggling for control
Zampa to Kohli, 1 run short and wide outside off, slapped to Smith at cover who lets the ball go through to long-off
Zampa to Rohit Sharma, 1 run loads of flight on that on leg, driven to long-on
Zampa to Kohli, 1 run a lovely drive with the spin to the sweeper cover
Zampa to Rohit Sharma, no run good finish, flat on leg. Blocked back
Coulter-Nile to Kohli, no run 141 kph, full outside off, some seam movement back in, driven to mid-off
Coulter-Nile to Kohli, 1 run good length on the pads, nurdled away to deep square leg
Coulter-Nile to Rohit Sharma, 1 run a short delivery on off, Rohit helps it along to deep square leg. Kept that down
Coulter-Nile to Kohli, no run full outside off, 139 kph, goes wide of the crease again, a nice drive finds Warner at extra cover
Coulter-Nile to Kohli, 1 run full and straight again, nudged away easily to deep square leg.
Coulter-Nile to Rohit Sharma, no run 136 kph, full delivery outside off, dabbed to point. Just played him out
Zampa to Kohli, no run nicely bowled, quick and straight, Kohli gets right forward and inside-edges a defensive prod into his pad. Zampa appeals
Zampa to Kohli, 2 runs not good fielding from Australia. Lots of flight on that outside off, driven past cover for a couple. The cover fielder just escorted that to the deep sweeper fielder
Zampa to Kohli, 1 run lots of flight on off, driven with the spin to long-off
Zampa to Rohit Sharma, no run loop and flight outside off, driven to Smith at cover
Zampa to Rohit Sharma, FOUR runs beautiful. Lots of flight on that outside off, Rohit gets forward and lifts the ball easily over cover. Inside-out
Zampa to Rohit Sharma, no run the googly on middle and leg, clipped to midwicket
Cummins to Kohli, no run good length on middle and leg, nudged away to midwicket
Cummins to Kohli, no run on a length outside off, dabbed to point.
Cummins to Kohli, no run 139 kph, on a length outside off, Kohli is looking for that dab down to third man but finds backward point
Cummins to Kohli, no run another one, trying to find one to third man. That's relatively safe though because it's wide outside off, beats the outside edge
Cummins to Kohli, no run five dot balls from Cummins. Good length outside off, glided off the face to backward point. These are terrific lines
Cummins to Kohli, 1 run good length outside off, Kohli stays back and punches a cut to the sweeper cover from the crease.
Zampa to Kohli, 1 run too much flight from Zampa, which means the ball is too full. Kohli eases into a drive to long-off
Zampa to Rohit Sharma, 1 run drops too short this time, Zampa throws his head back in disgust. Pushed to long-on
Zampa to Kohli, 2 runs far too much flight outside off, an easy skew to deep point for two very easy runs.
Zampa to Kohli, 3 runs gets it past third man, three more. Short and wide outside off, a deft dab down to third man for three. Cummins hauls it in
Zampa to Rohit Sharma, 1 run the googly outside off, flicked to long-on. These two milking Zampa with no trouble at all
Zampa to Kohli, no run 91 kph, the worst ball is a dot. A full toss outside off is driven to cover
Cummins to Rohit Sharma, no run good length outside off, 146 kph, tapped to backward point
Cummins to Rohit Sharma, no run full around off, Rohit stays in the crease to defend. Very clever batting, play their best bowlers out
Cummins to Rohit Sharma, 2 runs nicely played. Lets the ball come to him before guiding it past point for two more
Cummins to Rohit Sharma, no run good length outside off, 139 kph, glided off the face of the bat to point
Cummins to Rohit Sharma, 1 run beautifully punched from the crease to the sweeper cover. Stands tall and drills a push
Cummins to Kohli, no run good end, 145 kph, short delivery on middle, Kohli ducks out of the way hurriedly. Nice change in length
Head to Rohit Sharma, 1 run back of a length on off stump, punched to long-off
Head to Kohli, 1 run turn, and the ball stops on Kohli. Comes in towards his pads, and he punches it uppishly, with a carefully straight bat, to long-on
Head to Rohit Sharma, 1 run back of a length outside off, punched to sweeper cover
Head to Kohli, no run tossed up slower outside off, stretches out and drives to cover
Head to Kohli, no run back of a length, turns in towards off stump, punched to extra-cover
Head to Kohli, no run floated up slow on middle stump, clipped to square leg off the front foot

Cummins to Rohit Sharma, no run back of a length close to off stump, defended into the point region. Kohli wanted one, Rohit sent him back, rightly. Smith hared in from backward point to hunt that ball down
Cummins to Rohit Sharma, no run shortish and a bit of width, but it nipped away ever so slightly. Looked like the cross-seam release. Rohit slashed and missed

Cummins to Rohit Sharma, 1 leg bye shortish, angling into middle stump. Looks to help it into the fine-leg region, but the ball doesn't bounce as high as he expects and hits his thigh pad before rolling into the leg side
Cummins to Kohli, no run fullish, close to off stump. Drives firmly back down the ground, and Cummins sticks out his left hand to stop it in his follow-through
Cummins to Kohli, no run hits a nice length just outside off, and gets it to nip away and bounce a touch extra to beat Rohit's attempted glide to third man

Cummins to Kohli, no run length ball close to off stump, Kohli looks for the drive but has to check himself, with the ball stopping slightly, and ensure that the uppish shot falls short of extra-cover
Head to Rohit Sharma, 1 run length ball turning in towards off stump, lets it come on and dabs into the backward point region
Head to Kohli, 2 runs down the track, and that's nicely done. Gets fairly close to the pitch of this flighted ball outside off, and uses his bottom hand to whip it over midwicket
Head to Kohli, no run shortish outside off, some extra bounce to beat the attempted cut. Wade drops it, not sure if Kohli edged it or not
Head to Kohli, no run length ball on the pads, clipped towards backward square leg
Head to Kohli, 1 run slow length ball outside off, lets it come and dabs towards backward point

Head to Rohit Sharma, SIX runs down the track, and Rohit hoists that over wide long-on. Ensures he doesn't get too close to the pitch of it, opens up at the hips, and just extends his arms through his shot. Big boundary there, but he aimed at a vacant spot to the right of long-on, and just cleared the rope
Cummins to Kohli, 1 run back of a length outside off, lets it come on and guides it to third man
Cummins to Rohit Sharma, 1 run short outside off, waits on it and opens his bat-face to ramp it to the left of third man. Didn't look to hit it hard, just let the ball hit his bat
Cummins to Kohli, 1 run back of a length outside off, Kohli opens his bat face and picks up another single to third man
Cummins to Rohit Sharma, 2 runs back of a length, fourth-stump line, stands up tall and punches to the right of sweeper cover. they take two, but Rohit struggled through the second run
Cummins to Rohit Sharma, 1 run back of a length outside off, and Rohit brings up 6000 ODI runs with a dabbed single to third man. The ninth Indian to get there.
Cummins to Kohli, no run fullish, close to off stump, punched back to the bowler
Finch to Rohit Sharma, 2 runs length ball outside off, presses forward and opens his bat face to steer through point
Finch to Rohit Sharma, 1 run short outside off, and it stops and keeps low and takes an age to reach Rohit, who just taps it on its head to flat-bat it towards long-on
Finch to Kohli, no run short outside off, cut hard but straight to backward point
Finch to Kohli, 1 run back of a length on off stump, punched to long-on
Finch to Rohit Sharma, 1 run back of a length outside off, takes ages to reach Rohit. Uses his wrists to clip it to long-on
Finch to Kohli, 1 run back of a length wide of off, stabbed into the point region
Coulter-Nile to Kohli, no run full outside off and Kohli climbs into a drive, only to hit it straight to the man at extra-cover
Coulter-Nile to Kohli, 1 run back of a length outside off, dabbed away to third man
Coulter-Nile to Rohit Sharma, no run short outside off. Rohit swivels into a pull and it keeps low and stops on him. Bottom-edges it and it rolls to the right of the keeper
Coulter-Nile to Rohit Sharma, no run another short ball that struggles to reach Rohit. Shapes to pull again, ends up dragging it along the ground to mid-on, off the toe-end
Coulter-Nile to Rohit Sharma, no run fullish on off stump, blocked to mid-off

Coulter-Nile to Rohit Sharma, SIX runs there it is. Finally a short ball gets up to a reasonable height, on or around off stump, and he pulls it away over midwicket and it carries all the way to bring up his 14th ODI hundred. This has been a superb innings in difficult conditions for someone who really relishes the ball coming on to the bat
Finch to Kohli, 1 run short outside off, slapped away to sweeper cover
Finch to Rohit Sharma, no run nicely bowled, a bit of turn from a good length outside off. Reaches away from his body after pressing forward, and the ball beats his outside edge
Finch to Rohit Sharma, no run full, angled into middle and leg. Shapes to work it leg-side, adjusts for the slow pace and defends with the full face, back to the bowler
Finch to Rohit Sharma, no run turn again, sharp turn away from the stumps. Looks to sweep and it hits him on the hip
Finch to Rohit Sharma, 1 run back of a length now, on the stumps, punched to long-on
Finch to Kohli, no run tossed up outside off, presses forward and defends into the point region
Coulter-Nile to Rohit Sharma, 1 run short outside off, slapped to deep point
Coulter-Nile to Kohli, 1 run full on middle and leg, clipped to deep square leg
Coulter-Nile to Rohit Sharma, FOUR runs short, angling slightly down leg, and Rohit puts it away. Moves across and plays a controlled pull, off one leg, through backward square leg
Coulter-Nile to Rohit Sharma, 1 run short again, this time he has to pull from outside off to the man at deep square leg, who's well in front of square
Coulter-Nile to Kohli, 1 run short once more, pulled to deep square leg
Coulter-Nile to Rohit Sharma, SIX runs short again, on off stump, and Rohit doesn't care if it isn't going to come on to the bat. He hits it early, and launches it over long-on. That is some shot
Finch to Kohli, 1 run how slow is this pitch now? Goes for an inside-out drive, and his bat jams into the ground before inside-edging the ball back towards the bowler
Finch to Rohit Sharma, 1 run back of a length, driven to sweeper cover
Finch to Kohli, 1 run back of a length again, stops on the batsman, and he adjusts with his wrists to jab that to the right of sweeper cover
Finch to Rohit Sharma, 1 run length ball turning towards off stump. Rohit defends inside-out, and the ball rolls way towards backward point off the outside half of his bat
Finch to Kohli, FOUR runs long-hop, sits up on off stump, and he clears his front leg and smacks it over midwicket to bring up his first boundary
Finch to Kohli, 1 run back of a length outside off, waits on it and dabs it to the left of short third man

Faulkner to Kohli, 1 wide back of a length, angling down leg, Kohli can't connect with the flick. Faulkner's reviewed umpire Erasmus's not-out decision for caught behind. Interesting. The third umpire's checking for stumping as well. Is there a slight deflection? Can't really tell. Nothing on ultra-edge. And he hasn't lifted his back foot either
Faulkner to Kohli, 1 run back of a length, close to off stump, nice use of the hands to guide that down to third man
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, no run back of a length, angling into middle and leg, defended to midwicket
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, SIX runs and another. Short on off stump, and Rohit's decided he's going to hit them early today and hit them over long-on. That's almost a drive rather than a pull
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, 1 run full on middle and off, driven hard down the ground, on the bounce, to the right of long-off
Faulkner to Kohli, 1 run shortish on off stump, punched to the right of sweeper cover
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, 1 run full on off stump, leans back and flat-bats down the ground to the right of long-off
Zampa to Kohli, no run tossed up on middle stump, stretches forward to block
Zampa to Kohli, FOUR runs short on off stump, and Kohli puts it away, pulling hard and flat over midwicket
Zampa to Jadhav, FOUR runs long-hop, Jadhav drags a pull from outside off and picks up a one-bounce four over midwicket. This has been a terrible over, and he's picked up two wickets
Zampa to Jadhav, no run good ball, doesn't turn as much as Jadhav expects. Wanted to dab it down to third man, but it slid on straight and he inside-edged it into the pitch
Faulkner to Pandey, no run back of a length, angling into middle and off, clipped to midwicket
Faulkner to Pandey, no run full outside off, driven to extra-cover
Faulkner to Pandey, 1 run full, angling into off stump. Pandey looks to drive through cover, bottom-hand takes over and the bat comes down at an angle, and he gets a thick outside edge to third man
Faulkner to Jadhav, no run shuffles out of his crease, towards off stump. Faulkner shortens his length and he dabs to backward point
Faulkner to Jadhav, no run slower length ball close to off stump, blocked back to the bowler

Faulkner to Jadhav, no run back of a length, angling into off stump, Jadhav plays a copybook back-foot defensive. Maybe more open at the hips and shoulders than the textbook would recommend, but perfect for the inward angle
Zampa to Pandey, no run googly pitching wide of off, on a good length. Lots of turn and bounce, but still a safe leave for Pandey
Zampa to Pandey, 1 run back of a length on middle stump, goes deep in his crease to clip through square leg
Zampa to Jadhav, no run length ball, quickish, turning from middle to off. Gets on the front foot to defend
Zampa to Jadhav, no run fired in full, angling down leg, Misses the flick and it rolls off the pad to short fine leg
Zampa to Jadhav, 1 run down the pitch now, gets to the pitch and drives to long-off
Zampa to Pandey, 1 run tossed up outside off, presses forward for a gentle push to sweeper cover
Faulkner to Pandey, no run back of a length on off stump, clipped to midwicket with a turn of the wrists
Faulkner to Pandey, no run back of a length, close to off stump, jabbed back towards the bowler
Faulkner to Pandey, no run back of a length on off stump. Looks for a soft-hands single into the off side, but backward point moves in quickly to deny him
Faulkner to Pandey, FOUR runs full, angling into off stump, and he clears his front leg and swipes it away between mid-on and midwicket

Faulkner to Pandey, FOUR runs and that is that. Full outside off, and that bottom hand comes into play as he smears a drive down the ground. Jadhave gets his feet out of the way at the non-striker's end to let the ball streak to the long-on boundary

8.44pm India wrap up the series 4-1, and the scoreline is a fair reflection of their superiority in these conditions, especially in crunch situations. Today, their spinners made far better use of a surface with a lot of help for them, not giving away the freebies that their Australian counterparts doled out. And their chase was brilliantly constructed. Rohit and Rahane had to see out some very good new-ball bowling from Cummin

Ajinkya Rahane says the pitch had become really slow by the time India batted, and for that reason this was his best innings of the series. I have to agree with that - he was really, really good today.

9.15pm That's it for this ODI series - this was a good Australian team that got into a lot of good positions, but it ends with India winning 4-1 and sitting on top of the ODI rankings. A lot of good cricket from a lot of players to get them there. The T20 series begins in Ranchi next Saturday. Until then, good night!
India won by 7 wickets (with 43 balls remaining)
Player of the match is Rohit Sharma, INDIA
